intro: Bridelia patula, commonly known as the small-leaved bridelia, is a shrub native to tropical regions of Africa and Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae, which includes many species with milky sap. The plant features small, elliptical leaves that are usually covered in fine hairs.
